Title#1: [Diary covering the period from 13 August to 25 December 1864, including the Sand Creek Massacre]
Note#1: Sand Creek campaign, Governor Evans, Colonel Shoup, Colonel Chivington, Mexican trouble in Pueblo, hardships of the march, Camp Weld, camp life at Christmas. 1864. [From print finding aid for the Hal Sayre Papers]
